    #include<iostream>
    #include<algorithm>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
        int n,q;
        cin>>n>>q;
        long long a[n],t;
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                cin>>a[i];
            }
            sort(a,a+n);
            while(q--)
            {
                cin>>t;
                if(t>=a[0]&&t<=a[n-1])
                cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
                else
                cout<<"No"<<endl;
            }
            return 0;
    }
